result.execSummary:
Ruben R Deanda was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Ruben R Deanda was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ruben R Deanda

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ruben R Deanda not in court.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has been turned over to the State of MINNESOTA on 05.24.2022
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.
Received and Filed: Attorney Jade Hall

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court, defendant Ruben R Deanda not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for.  Status Conference held.  Defendant has pending matter 22CF1584 in which he posted cash bail.  The extradition desk has been notified Defendant can be shipped to MINNESOTA.  Court adjourns matter.  Court continues order that defendant be REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ruben R Deanda in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Ruben R Deanda in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ruben R Deanda appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of MINNESOTA.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
